thread.title_full: Nina Dobrev sports a bright pink and black style | Daily Mail Online

author: Sam Machado For Dailymail.Com
title: Nina Dobrev sports a bright pink and black style | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share With a black hat on, the TV star let her dark hair flow down at a shoulder length. Tight pants: The actress wore hot pink 'Bye Felicia' leggings on her walk Her shoes also happened to match her attire with black sneakers and pink material attached. Carrying a purse and a bottle of water, the brunette beauty appeared to be in a positive mood as she pumped some endorphins into her system. And with no makeup on, Nina looked flawless and healthy. Staying fit: The Vampire Diaries star added on a black tank top with matching sneakers Nina is most commonly known for her role as Elena on The Vampire Diaries although she left the series after six seasons. But E! News announced last month that she would be returning for the series finale airing on March 10. Series creators Julie Plec and Kevin Williamson released a statement on how happy they are that their leading woman will be there for the show's final departure. Julie said: 'I'm thrilled to bring this show to an end the way we always intended- with Nina back to help us say goodbye.' Farewell: The TV star is set to return for the final episode of The Vampire Diaries airing in March. Here is a still of Nina's character Elena in the upcoming finale Kevin added: 'I'm so excited to have Nina back to ensure our farewell episode is truly epic!' Earlier this month, Nina took to her Instagram page to post a photo of the script for the final episode called I Was Feeling Epic. She captioned the pic: 'I know it's Thursday, but this is not a TBT. #BackOnSet #TBDForever' TVD Forever: The actress shared her excitement to be back on the show for the finale with an Instagram photo of the last episode's script cover
